name: Black Roses
description: Black Roses is a 2D time trial shooter platformer. You must fight your way through the game as fast as possible to beat other peoples times.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3)/Vista/Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent Graphics: NVIDIA 8800GS / ATI Radeon HD 2900 Pro or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 110 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3)/Vista/Windows 7 Processor: Intel Quad Core i5 Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 / ATI Radeonâ„¢ HD 5850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
